en: What is there in this box?
One is Kamala's; one is Vinod's.
What are there in this bag?

te: ఒక పువ్వు నాది; ఒక పువ్వు విజయది; ఒక పువ్వు సరళది.
en: One flower is mine; one flower is Vijaya's; one flower is Sarala's.
It is not yours; it is his.
It is not his; it is my brother's.
How many more questions are there, grandfather?
This is the month of October.
It is Mahatma Gandhi's birthday tomorrow.
And it is our grandfather's birthday!
Then where are the chocolates, grandfather?
How much did they cost, grandfather?
What is the cost of each chocolate?
What is the cost of this bag?
What is the cost of your new pen?
This is not a new pen.
Her birthday is on sixteenth February.
then; if so (as a sentence initiator)
